description:
An advanced AI assistant for NVDA using Gemini.
Features:
- Smart Translator (NVDA+Shift+T)
- Smart Dictation (NVDA+Shift+S)
- Text Refiner with Custom Prompts & Variables (NVDA+Shift+R)
- Vision & UI Locator (NVDA+Shift+V / O)
- Document QA (PDF/TIFF/Text) (NVDA+Shift+D)
- CAPTCHA Solver with Auto-Type (NVDA+Shift+6)
- Audio Transcription (NVDA+Shift+A)
